dict.acceptation: 把…借给；贷（款）；贡献，给予；适于；

sent.orig: Mary lend john some books. Mary lend some book to John.
He lend the company money or he lend money to the company.
As a result it does not increase such banks' appetite to lend.
sent.trans: 结果它没有增加银行贷款的愿望。

sent.orig: I will lend you books as many as you want.
sent.trans: 你要借多少本书，我就借给你多少本。

sent.orig: I chipped in to lend a helping hand for that poor girl.
sent.trans: 我捐了一些钱，想帮帮那个可怜的女孩。
